meanings.definition: A type of weave in which the warp yarns are arranged in pairs and twisted around each other between picks of weft yarn.
meanings.sent1: The leno weave creates a unique pattern in the fabric.
meanings.sent2: The leno technique gives the cloth a special texture.
meanings.sent3: The skilled weaver used the leno style to craft a beautiful design.
meanings.sent4: Her fingers moved like leno threads, intertwining with precision.
meanings.sent5: The leno method results in a strong and durable material.

meanings.definition: A fabric made using this type of weave.
meanings.sent1: The leno fabric had a delicate appearance.
meanings.sent2: She wore a dress made of soft leno material.
meanings.sent3: The leno cloth fluttered in the breeze like a gentle butterfly.
meanings.sent4: The leno textile shimmered under the sunlight.
meanings.sent5: The leno creation felt smooth to the touch.

meanings.definition: A person who operates a loom to create leno fabric.
meanings.sent1: The skilled leno weaver worked diligently on the loom.
meanings.sent2: The experienced leno operator produced intricate designs.
meanings.sent3: The leno weaver hummed a tune while working on the loom.
meanings.sent4: The dedicated leno worker wove with passion and skill.
meanings.sent5: The talented leno artisan crafted beautiful fabrics.
